Basic support / technical questions. There are many resources to get you up to speed:  https://ethereum.org/en/learn/

author: christian.trn
content: Hello all, I have a use case where I need to do many simple eth_calls as fast as possible. Currently, the batch request in go-ethereum is running requests sequentially which make it slow. What do you you think about either 1. make batch request run concurrent requests or 2. create a new method to run eth_call concurrently, like `eth_concurrentCall` ? I would be very happy to make this contribution.
